General.Name: Inflection Resources Ltd
General.Description: Inflection Resources Ltd., a junior resource company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in New South Wales and Queensland, Australia. It primarily explores for gold and copper deposits. The company holds an interest in the Northern New South Wales project consisting of non-surveyed non-contiguous exploration licenses and applications consisting of approximately 7,000 square kilometers located in the Lachlan Fold Belt region of New South Wales, Australia. It also holds a 100% interest in the Carron Project covering exploration licenses and area of 61,200 hectare located in the in Queensland, Australia. Inflection Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1130 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada
